Good Comments: I have seen some bad fansubs in the 10 yrs I've been watching anime fansubs, but you'll know from the 1st minute that it takes bad to a whole new level... "orge", "w/", "itterashai"... seriously?! You need to understand basic Japanese to watch these subs.
For Ookii 1 Nensei to Chiisana 2 Nensei the subs were really bad, some lines even not subbed

arigatou = thx
over there = ogre there
etc
furthermore they didn't translate/sub everything
Bad Comments: the worst subs ever. seriously. the same word is mistranslated three times in a row when it was correct the first time!
The most uniquely done subs I've seen. And they left the obvious stuff in Japanese for our own understanding.
